data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Al Buhayrah, Egypt a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Buhayrah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Al Buhayrah.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Al Buhayrah prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: the state of Al Buhayrah has (about) 208,595 people who know Jesus, 407,136 people who know about him culturally, and 4,073,870 people who are far from Jesus.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Al Buhayrah, Egypt to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 208,595 believers in the state of Al Buhayrah to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Al Buhayrah, Egypt.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Al Buhayrah
location.cities_list: Kafr ad Dawwār, Damanhūr, Idkū, Disūq, Ḩawsh ‘Īsá
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kafr ad Dawwār (267,370), Damanhūr (227,943), Idkū (210,678), Disūq (102,037), Ḩawsh ‘Īsá (85,352)
